txt.en: 'Hail, [placeholder]! You assisted in defeating Núrzum, but the enemy has not given up. They still roam our lands and lurk in the shadows.\n\n'The enemy is especially strong in the Fallows today. Go there, and show them that Wildermore will endure!'
The Fallows farmland is safer now that Shum has been taken care of, thanks to you. The people of Forlaw appreciate your efforts.
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Núrzum has been defeated, but the enemy persists throughout much of Wildermore.
Shum is training some of Gajat's adolescent Warg pups how to hunt in a pack. They stalk the smoking ruins that were the farms of The Fallows.
